item.title: RubyConf 2008 - Future of RubyVM - Koichi Sasada
item.description: The first session I attended at RubyConf 2008 was called “Future of RubyVM”, and it began my ascent into “VM Wonkiness” as I started to call it. Koichi-san is responsible for leading the team of Ruby 1.9 implementers, and is the authoritative source of info on its status. I was hoping to learn a few things, as well as to run into new acquaintance Nobuyoshi Nakada, one of the core team members.
